946:2: atha dvijo bāla ivāptavedaḥ kṣipraṃ vaṇik prāpta ivāptalābhaḥ|
946:3: jitvā ca rājanya ivārisainyaṃ nandaḥ kṛtārtho gurumabhyagacchat||1||
946:4: draṣṭuṃ sukhaṃ jñānasamāptikāle gururhi śiṣyasya gurośca śiṣyaḥ|
946:5: pariśramaste saphalo mayīti yato didṛkṣāsya munau babhūva||2||
946:7: āryaḥ sarāgo'pi kṛtajñabhāvāt prakṣīṇamānaḥ kimu vītarāgaḥ||3||
946:8: yasyārthakāmaprabhavā hi bhaktistato'sya sā tiṣṭhati rūḍhamūlā|
946:9: dharmānvayo yasya tu bhaktirāgastasya prasādo hṛdayāvagāḍhaḥ||4||
946:10: kāṣāyavāsāḥ kanakāvadātastataḥ sa mūrdhnā gurave praṇeme|
946:12: athātmanaḥ śiṣyaguṇasya caiva mahāmuneḥ śāstṛguṇasya caiva|
946:13: saṃdarśanārthaṃ sa na mānahetoḥ svāṃ kāryasiddhiṃ kathayāmbabhūva||6||
946:14: yo dṛṣṭiśalyo hṛdayāvagāḍhaḥ prabho bhṛśaṃ māmatudat sutīkṣṇaḥ|
946:15: tvadvākyasaṃdaṃśamukhena me sa samuddhṛtaḥ śalyahṛteva śalyaḥ||7||
946:16: kathaṃkathābhāvagatosmi yena chinnaḥ sa niḥsaṃśaya saṃśayo me|
946:19: tanme hataṃ tvadvacanāgadena viṣaṃ vināśīva mahāgadena||9||
946:20: kṣayaṃ gataṃ janma nirastajanman saddharmacaryāmuṣito'smi samyak|
946:21: kṛtsnaṃ kṛtaṃ me kṛtakārya kāryaṃ lokeṣu bhūto'smi na lokadharmā||10||
946:23: tavāsmi gāṃ sādhu nipīya tṛptastṛṣeva gāmuttama vatsavarṇaḥ||11||
946:24: yatpaśyataścādhigamo mamāyaṃ tanme samāsena mune nibodha|
946:25: sarvajña kāmaṃ viditaṃ tavaitat svaṃ tūpacāraṃ pravivakṣurasmi||12||
946:26: anye'pi santo vimumukṣavo hi śrutvā vimokṣāya nayaṃ parasya|
946:27: muktasya rogādiva rogavantastenaiva mārgeṇa sukhaṃ ghaṭante||13||
946:28: urvyādikān janmani vedima dhātun nātmānamurvyādiṣu teṣu kiñcit|
946:29: yasmādatasteṣu na me'sti saktirbahiśca kāyena samā matirme||14||
946:33: tasmādanityeṣu nirātmakeṣu duḥkheṣu me teṣvapi nāsti saṃgaḥ||16||
946:34: yataśca lokaṃ samajanmaniṣṭhaṃ paśyāmi niḥsāramasacca sarvam|
946:35: ato dhiyā me manasā vibaddhamasmīti me neñjitamasti yena||17||
946:37: amūrcchitaścāgrathitaśca tatra tribhyo vimukto'smi tato bhavebhyaḥ||18||
946:39: yasmāt samātmānugataśca tatra tasmād visaṃyogagato'smi muktaḥ||19||
946:40: ityevamuktvā gurubāhumānyāt sarveṇa kāyena sa gāṃ nipannaḥ|
946:42: tataḥ pramādat prasṛtasya pūrvaṃ śruvā dhṛtiṃ vyākaraṇaṃ ca tasya|
946:44: uttiṣṭha dharme sthita śiṣyajuṣṭe kiṃ pādayorme patito'si murdhnā|
946:45: abhyarcanaṃ me na tathā praṇāmo dharme yathaiṣā pratipattireva||22||
946:47: jitātmanaḥ pravrajanaṃ hi sādhu calātmano na tvajitendriyasya||23||
946:48: adyāsi śaucena pareṇa yukto vākkāyacetāṃsi śucīni yatte|
946:49: ataḥ punaścāprayatāpasaumyāṃ yatsaumya no vekṣyasi garbhaśayyām||24||
946:51: kṛtaśruto vipratipadyamāno nindyo hi nirvīrya ivāttaśastraḥ||25||
946:53: yāsyāmi niṣṭhāmiti bāliśo hi janmakṣayāt trāsamihābhyupaiti||26||
946:54: diṣṭyā durāpaḥ kṣaṇasaṃnipāto nāyaṃ kṛto mohavaśena moghaḥ|
946:55: udeti duḥkhena gato hyadhastāt kūrmo yugacchidra ivārṇavasthaḥ||27||
946:56: nirjitya māraṃ yudhi durnivāramadyāsi loke raṇaśīrṣaśūraḥ|
946:57: śūro'pyaśūraḥ sa hi veditavyo doṣairamitrairiva hanyate yaḥ||28||
946:58: nirvāpya rāgāgnimudīrṇamadya diṣṭyā sukhaṃ svapsyasi vītadāhaḥ|
946:59: duḥkhaṃ hi śete śayane'pyudāre kleśāgninā cetasi dahyamānaḥ||29||
946:61: yāvat satarṣaḥ puruṣo hi loke tāvat samṛddho'pi sadā daridraḥ||30||
946:62: adyāpadeṣṭuṃ tava yuktarūpaṃ śuddhodano me nṛpatiḥ piteti|
946:65: sarvo hi saṃsāragato bhayārto yathaiva kāntāragatastathaiva||32||
946:66: āraṇyakaṃ bhaikṣacaraṃ vinītaṃ drakṣyāmi nandaṃ nibhṛtaṃ kadeti|
946:67: āsīt purastāttvayi me didṛkṣā tathāsi diṣṭyā mama darśanīyaḥ||33||
946:68: bhavatyarūpo'pi hi darśanīyaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ śreṣṭhatamaigurṇaiḥ svaiḥ|
946:69: doṣaiḥ parīto malinīkaraistu sudarśanīyo'pi virūpa eva||34||
946:70: adya prakṛṣṭā tava buddhimattā kṛtsnaṃ yayā te kṛtamātmakāryam|
946:71: śrutonnatasyāpi hi nāsti buddhirnotpadyate śreyasi yasya buddhiḥ||35||
946:72: unmīlitasyāpi janasya madhye nimīlitasyāpi tathaiva cakṣuḥ|
946:73: prajñāmayaṃ yasya hi nāsti cakṣuścakṣurna tasyāsti sacakṣuṣo'pi||36||
946:75: ajasramāgacchati tacca bhūyo jñānena yasyādya kṛtastvayāntaḥ||37||
946:76: duḥkhaṃ na me syāt sukhameva me syāditi pravṛttaḥ satataṃ hi lokaḥ|
946:77: na vetti taccaiva tathā yathā syāt prāptaṃ tvayādyāsulabhaṃ yathāvat||38||
946:79: staveṣu nindāsu ca nirvyapekṣaḥ kṛtāñjalirvākyamuvāca nandaḥ||39||
946:80: aho viśeṣeṇa viśeṣadarśin stvayānukampā mayi darśiteyaṃ|
946:82: bhrātrā tvayā śreyasi daiśikena pitrā phalasthena tathaiva mātrā|
946:83: hato'bhaviṣyaṃ yadi na vyamokṣyaṃ sārthāt paribhraṣṭa ivākṛtārthaḥ||41||
946:84: śāntasya tuṣṭasya sukho viveko vijñātatattvasva parīkṣakasya|
946:86: atho hi tattvaṃ parigamya samyaṅnirdhūya doṣānadhigamya śāntim|
946:87: svaṃ nāśramaṃ samprati cintayāmi na taṃ janaṃ nāpsaraso na devān||43||
946:88: idaṃ hi bhuktvā śuci śāmikaṃ sukhaṃ na me manaḥ kāṃkṣati kāmajaṃ sukham|
946:90: aho'ndhavijñānanimīlitaṃ jagat paṭāntare paśyati nottamaṃ sukham|
946:91: sudhīramadhyatmasukhaṃ vyapāsya hi śramaṃ tathā kāmasukhārthamṛcchati||45||
946:92: yathā hi ratnākarametya durmatirvihāya ratnānyasato maṇīn haret|
946:93: apāsya saṃbodhisukhaṃ tathottamaṃ śramaṃ vrajet kāmasukhopalabdhaye||46||
946:95: apāsya yaddhyānasukhaṃ mune paraṃ parasya duḥkhoparamāya khidyase||47||
946:96: mayā nu śakyaṃ pratikartumadya kiṃ gurau hitaiṣiṇyanukampake tvayi|
946:98: tato ministasya niśamya hetumat prahīṇasarvāsravasūcakaṃ vacaḥ|
946:99: idaṃ babhāṣe vadatāmanuttamo yadarhati śrīghana eva bhāṣituṃ||49||
946:100: idaṃ kṛtārthaḥ paramārthavit kṛtī tvameva dhīmannabhidhātumarhasi|
946:103: na dṛṣṭasatyo'pi tathāvabudhyate pṛthagjanaḥ kiṃbata buddhimānapi||51||
946:105: rajaḥprakarṣeṇa jagatyavasthite kṛtajñabhāvo hi kṛtajña durlabhaḥ||52||
946:106: sadharma dharmānvayato yataśca te mayi prasādo'dhigame ca kauśalam|
946:107: ato'sti bhūyastvayi me vivakṣitaṃ nato hi bhaktaśca niyogamarhasi||53||
946:108: avāptakāryo'si parāṃ gatiṃ gato na te'sti kiñcit karaṇīyamaṇvapi|
946:109: ataḥparaṃ saumya carānukampayā vimokṣayan kṛcchragatān parānapi||54||
946:112: ihottamebhyo'pi mataḥ sa tūttamo ya uttamaṃ dharmamavāpya naiṣṭhikam|
946:114: vihāya tasmādiha kāryamātmanaḥ kuru sthirātman parakāryamapyatho|
946:115: bhramatsu sattveṣu tamāvṛtātmasu śrutapradīpo niśi dhāryatāmayam||57||
946:116: bravītu tāvat puri vismito janastvayi sthite kurvati dharmadeśanāḥ
946:117: aho batāścaryamidaṃ vimuktaye karoti rāgī yadayaṃ kathāmiti||58||
946:118: dhruvaṃ hi saṃśrutya tava sthiraṃ mano nivṛttanānāviṣayairmanorathaiḥ|
946:119: vadhūrgṛhe sāpi tavānukurvatī kariṣyate strīṣu virāgiṇīḥ kathāḥ||59||
946:120: tvayi paramadhṛtau niviṣṭatattve bhavanagatā na hi raṃsyate dhruvaṃ sā|
946:121: manasi śamadamātmake vivikte matiriva kāmasukhaiḥ parīkṣakasya||60||
946:122: ityarhataḥ paramakāruṇikasya śāsturmūrdhnā vacaśca caraṇau ca samaṃ gṛhītvā|
946:123: svasthaḥ praśāntahṛdayo vinivṛttakāryaḥ pārśvānmuneḥ pratiyayau vimadaḥ karīva||61||
946:124: bhikṣārthaṃ samaye viveśa sa puraṃ dṛṣṭīrjanasyākṣipan
946:126: nirmokṣāya cakāra tatra ca kathāṃ kāle janāyārthine
946:128: ityeṣā vyupaśāntaye na rataye mokṣārthagarbhā kṛtiḥ
946:130: yanmokṣāt kṛtamanyadatra hi mayā tatkāvyadharmāt kṛtaṃ
946:131: pātuṃ titkamivauṣadhaṃ madhuyutaṃ hṛdyaṃ kathaṃ syāditi||63||
946:133: kāvyavyājena tattvaṃ kathitamiha mayā mokṣaḥ paramiti|
946:134: tadbuddhvā śamikaṃ yattadavahitamito grāhyaṃ na lalitaṃ
946:136: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “ājñā-vyākaraṇa“ nāmaka aṣṭādaśa sarga samāpta|
